bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs yangs pa/ tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ lha dang 'jig rten
du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba ston pa dang / byang chub sem

sa dpa'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' med pa dang / kha dog tshad med pa dang / gzi brjid tshad med pa dang / snang ba tshad med pa dang / dbyings tshad med pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa

tshad med pa dang / sgra sgrogs pa rnam par rig pa tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi yul tshad med pa dang / mtha' dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rjes su 'dzin pa dang / bdud

du bcas/ tshangs par bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa dang / skye dgu dang / lha dang / mir bcas pa dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa/ mi 'phrogs pa'i byams pa chen po'i spyod yul ba
snying rje chen po la phyogs pa'i mtha' la phyogs pas sems can rjes su 'dzin pa/ gzhan mtho ris su skye ba'i sems can rjes su 'dzin pa/ bsod nams kyi stobs kyi dbang po phun sum tshogs pa
dbang po rnam par dag pa dang / sems cang shes yongs su dag pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ theg pa chen po yongs su
rdzogs pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad las 'byung ba'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dang spyod pa rnam par dag

pa rdzogs pa'o/ /dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho zhing yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshe dang / bdag gi lus su skye ba dang / sgyu ma lta bur spyod pa dang / sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin

la thug pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i rnam par rig pa dang / yul nam mkha' ltar tshad med par song ba/ 'dod pa lta bur skye ba la ma chags pa/ smig rgyu dang / mnyam par snang ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos
la 'brang ba/ gnas med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa/ bla re dang brgyan chen po'i mdzod bdag gi lus skye ba'i mtha' yang sangs rgyas
kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rin po che chen pos spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po ches mchod pa'i gnas chen po la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang
sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / yid la byed pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rnam par sprul pa chen po'i mdzod ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi

mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ye shes chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ma las skyes pa de la gnas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / yul chen

po sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu brnyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / grangs
med pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po la rnam par spyod cing mnyam par 'jog pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag las bzhengs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi

mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma dang / spyod pa dang po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i mtha'i bar gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sa 'di nas gnyis
kyi bar du thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas phyis 'jig rten gyi grangs la shes par ston pa dang / gzi brjid sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa
dang / gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /
mngon par byung ba dang / rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / thabs rnam pa sna tshogs
kyis kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig
rten kun dang / phyogs thams cad du rgya mtsho'i rgyun dang / rigs kyis 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / zhing dang dus ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
pa mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sems can gyi rigs ma lus pas kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /

'chi 'pho zhing skye ba dang / rigs ma lus pas kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sprul pa chen po dang / rigs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rig dang / chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los
kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gnyis pa'o/ /dge bar spyod pa las rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba thams cad dang /
ye shes dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba bstan pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems can 'dul zhing rjes su chud par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang yongs su rdzogs par byed
pa dang / sems can rnams la dgos pa'i slas ston pa'i rjes su song zhing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dod chags dang bral te gnas la gnas pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / sgra dbyangs tham
sa cad dang bral bar so sor rtog pa dang / srid pa thams cad dang / mi dang srid par 'byung ba la rtog pa dang / dngos po thams cad ye shes su 'jug pa dang / tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar
yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos slas ltar 'gro ba la rnam par lta ba dang / byams pa chen pos sems yul la so sor rtog pa dang / dga' ba chen pos 'jig rten las mngon par dga'
ba shes par byed pa dang / btang snyoms chen pos sems la dbang sgyur zhing 'jug par byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bdag la yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chos kyi
dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dus lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / thams cad du gnas pa med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / g.yog 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan tan
byed pa dang / chos ston cing smra ba rjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po smad pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa rtogs pa ji ltar spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa
ston pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / ji ltar yongs su smin pa 'dul ba dang / thabs la mkhas

pa grangs med pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa las mi ldog par ston pa dang / spyod pa'i sgo sna tshogs kyi chos snang bar byed pa dang / gnas med pa'i rnam pa'i sems can rnams kyi
bsam pa rnam par dag pa byed pa dang / snying rje chen po skyes pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par 'bebs par byed pa dang / sbrang bu 'gro ba ltar byams pa la 'jug cing cho 'phrul gsum yongs su 'bebs
par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la lta ba rnam par rig cing slas kyi dbus na 'dug pa ston pa dang / de las mtha'i mtha' dang / dbung med pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
ston pa dang / ye shes chen po la gnas pas gnod cing sgribs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / las kyi mtha'i chos gsum la thabs mkhas pa ste/
lus kyi las shin du rnam par dag pa dang / ngag gis mi 'phro ba'i ye shes shin du rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi las zab mo chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i
sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gsum pa'o/ /mngon par byung ba'i rnam par rgyal ba chen pos slas tshad med pa'i rgyan
gyis brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba spangs te/ 'byung ba'i spyod pa ston cing 'jig rten gnas pa'i sems can 'dzud pa dang / 'jig rten mngon par chags par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
grangs mi rtog go zhes shes par byed pa dang / 'jig rten sna tshogs la mngon par chags pa zlog par byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba'i sred pa gcod pa dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa 'jig

rten sbyong du 'jug pa dang / don thams cad rjes su dran par byed pa dang / 'byung ba'i don gyi phyir 'brang bar byed pa dang / khyim pa'i mtshan ma yongs su gtong ba ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i
chos la sbyor zhing gnas par byed pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byed pa dang / ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor
so sor rnyed par byed cing sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i rab rib la lta ba dang / bdag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pas 'gro ba thams cad nye bar khrid pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa
ba thams cad 'du zhing sangs rgyas las bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye dgu thams cad la bsngags pa dang / bdag ye shes kyi don mthong ba'i ston pa dang / sems can rnams la rnam par
dag pa'i sgo brjod pa dang / sems can rnams la kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgo sgrub tu 'dzud pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu ston pa dang / mngon par 'byung zhing thams cad
mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan kun sgreng bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bzhi pa'o/ /mdzad pa dang ye shes du ma dang rab tu ldan pas byang chub kyi
shing drung du gshegs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin nas byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad thugs su chud de/ bdud kyi stobs rab tu bcom
zhing zil gyis mi non pa'i sku'i byin gyi brlabs kyi mdzod dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du khyab par byed pa dang / byin gyi brlabs mi zad pa'i mthas mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang /
tshad med pa'i spyod pa rab tu brnyes pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don gyi rjes su gshegs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bsgrubs pa yongs su
rdzogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du spras pa'i gdan yongs su gsal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rig par
byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mchog rab tu brnyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / yang dag pa'i khyad par gyi smon lam la rnam
par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dgongs pa dang / zab mo'i byang chub sems dpa' la chos zab mo'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rtsom pa dang /
brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas kyi phyir 'brang zhing sna tshogs kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten
thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi yul du byas pa dang / sems can la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par rig par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dbyer med pas 'byung ba'i
ba'i sa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas shing yon tan thams cad kyi khyad par ma lus pa'i mtha' rab tu rnyed de 'dug pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'gro
ba dang / sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar 'gro ba dang / zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba dang / yongs
su smin pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / dus thams cad du 'gro ba dang / 'dul ba thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol par 'gro ba dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa
thams cad kyi dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par chud par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lnga pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes par byed pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / ma lus
pa thams cad du ma lus par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mi 'jigs pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod dang / mun pa med
pa'i chos kyi mdzod kyi sgo snang ba'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / nam mkha'i ngos ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med
pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgribs pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i tshul
gyis 'khor lo dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos snang bar byed pa'i dus gsum du 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
gcig tu snyug pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang mi 'gal ba'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / de la sogs pa grangs med pa'i rnams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems

can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod par 'gro ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /'di ltar chos kyi 'khor lo skor bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/

'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa drug pa'o/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la

sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lha'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang dang / dri za'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po

'i pho brang dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i pho brang dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / 'bar ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / sha za'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dag tu sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ gang 'di grong khyer gyi sgor gshegs nas sa g.yo zhing 'od zer gyi snang bas long ba rnams ni so sor mig thob/ 'on pa rnams ni so sor sgra

thos/ smyon pa rnams ni so sor dran pa rnyed/ gcer bu rnams kyang so sor gos rnyed/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni so sor bde ba thob/ sil snyan dang brdung ba rnams ma brdungs par yid du 'ong ba'i sgra skad

'byin pa dang / brdung ba ma brdungs pa dang / 'phyang 'phrul rnams 'phyang ba dang / brdungs pa'i sgra dang / bram ze sna tshogs mang po rnams kyi sgra skad yid du 'ong ba dang / lta bas mi ngoms shing mi mthun pa med pa gzugs kyi

sku ston pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /

kun du gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / brkyang ba dang bskum pas kyang sems can la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / byon pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / 'chag pa dang / bzhugs pa dang /
gzims pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / chos 'chad pa dang / cang mi gsung bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la

sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad

pa dang / sna tshogs kyi sems can gyi bsam pa rgya mtsho ma lus pa dang / 'jig rten gyi spyod pa grangs med pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la gnas pa dang sangs

rgyas dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa'i phyir 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'byung zhing skye ba

dang / smra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / smra ba shin du dkon pa dang / dkar po'i chos thams cad dang / bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang / sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa kha dog mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon du rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rtog pa

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa zhing thams cad la gzigs shing 'jug pa dang / 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nye bar spyod pas kyang 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa

dang / de dag dang ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i las dang / rjes su ston pa dang / tshig tu 'byin pa dang / yang dang yang du yid la byed pa dang / mngon par lta ba dang / mngon du dran pa dang / sems dang bas
sangs rgyas la sdug par sems pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i ro dang / sangs rgyas 'byung bas 'jig rten thams

cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa la lta ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dad pa sna tshogs

dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs tshad med pa la lta ba'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa
dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra thos pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ de la sogs pa'i mtha' med bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa'i rnam pa
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i stobs ji lta ba

bzhin du 'dul ba las mi 'da' ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la 'jig rten thams cad 'dzud de/ yul las phyir mi ldog cing thugs rje chen po gtong ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam la mi skyo ba dang /

sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad la rtog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la gnas shing dge ba rgyas pa tshad med pa brnyes te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdun pa'o/ /dgon pa na bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang / dben pa na bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang / dben pa na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la bzhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas shing bzhugs pa na gcig pur dgyes pa na bzhugs pa dang / sku bltar

mi snang bar bzhugs pa dang / ye shes zab mo la gnas shing bzhugs pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi stobs la bzhugs pa dang / sku'i spyod pa bltar med pa la bzhugs pa rgyun mi gcod pas
kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang dang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes dang / smon lam
gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas lha yongs su 'tshol zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas klu yongs su 'tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas nam
mkha' lding yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi 'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas lto 'phye chen po yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas 'bar ba yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi

dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / chos ston pas

kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam gcig tu bsdus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi spyod pa rnam par phye ba dang / spyod pa'i rim pa'i mthu dang / 'jig rten gyi yul dang /

sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / 'jig rten gyi yul gyi mthu dang / yul ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mtshan mo
dang / nyin par dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo gcig dang / bgrang bar gnas na bzhugs pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par gnas na bzhugs pa'i bar gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brgyad pa'o/ /khang pa lta bur gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam
par sbyangs par gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnams dad par gyur pa dang / mos par gyur pa la sems 'jug cing sgrub par gyur pa dang / dbang po rnams 'dul bar gyur

pa dang / sems can dang skye dgu thams cad la dad par gyur pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad 'byung bar gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskur bar gyur pa dang / rtog pa la gnas shing ye shes snang bar

gyur pa dang / gzhan dring la mi 'jog pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mya ngan las 'das pa ston cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / 'jig rten

mi rtag pa ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi snang bar mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / byas pa'i dgos pa'i mtha' bsdus pa dang / ngo bo ma tshang ba med pas chos la 'jug pa snang bar byas pa dang / rtsa ba bcad pa la srid pa'i

mig snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams la skyo ba ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang 'thun par byed pa dang / sems can rnams tshe'i mtha' ston pa dang / sems can thams cad la

'jig rten gyi mngon par mi dga' ba nye bar ston pa dang / sems can rnams ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bltar mi smad pa'i chos kyi 'khor

lo bskor zhing rnam par chud par mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten spro ba snang bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas sems rtsom pa dang ldan pa dang ldan par 'jog pa dang / su de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran zhing lta ba
rnam par dag pa'i yongs su rtog pa'i sems can rnams la sems can rnams slong bar mdzad pa dang / dbang po skyo ba zlog cing yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba

thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang / skyo ba rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyis rlob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi brtsem bar dgongs pa'i rkyen brnyes pa dang / lus
gyes pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sems can rnams 'dzin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sems can 'khrugs pa dang myos pa rnams sdom pa la 'jog par mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dgu pa'o/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das nas 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams thams cad smre sngags 'don pa dang /

ngu ba dang / mya ngan slos pa dang / mchi ma byung bar 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / thugs rje chen po zhes bya ba dang / ded dpon chen po zhes pa dang / thugs brtse ba zhes pa
dang / lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pa dang / skyabs su gyur pa/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'das par gyur ces pa dang /

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung bar dga' ba zhes pa dang / rnam pa 'di lta bur smre sngags 'don/ mya ngan slos shing sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dang de dag tu sems can gyi bsam pa dang / yid la byed par yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang

dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'i gnas tham

sa cad du ji ltar 'dul ba dang / ji ltar dad pa bzhin du sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/ rang gi sku bor nas tshad med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par
sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob cing / gang 'di'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi dad pas mchod pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam
par dag pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyangs pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi bsod
nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par rtsom pa'i dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi rgyan sna tshogs yul dang /
ljongs sna tshogs kyi sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'i dbang dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bgos shing 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod rten du byas shing yul dang phyogs der lha'i
gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / mi'i gnas dang / 'bar ba'i gnas su sku gdung
dang ring bsrel mchod par 'gyur/ sku gdung dang / ring bsrel dang / dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas bzhugs par mchod rten brtsigs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas
rjes su dran par 'gyur/ chos kyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la dad pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ yul dang phyogs de dang der gnas shing rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par bsam pas gnas nas/
sbyin pa byin zhing bsod nams byed par 'gyur te/ de dang de dag mtho ris kyi yongs su dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ rigs chen po so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ longs spyod chen po dang / g.yog
'khor rnam par dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa so sor myong bar 'gyur/ ngan par mi lhung ba'i nan tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de dag sangs
rgyas byung ba na gti mug med pas sgrub par 'gyur/ dkar po'i chos la gnas pa so sor rdzogs par 'gyur/ khams gsum nas 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ ji ltar theg
pa la dad pa dang / smon lam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la shing byas pa gzo ba so sor rnyed par 'gyur te/ phyir 'brang ba dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang /
dpung gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin gnas sbyong ste
bsod nams yongs su mi gnas pa'i sbyin gnas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du skye ba 'di lta bu'i rnam pa mang por sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing bsod
nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yangs pa dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par gzhan 'jig rten gyi yul
thams cad kyi lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas
pas kyang 'jug par nus pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ bam po gsum pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo chos kyi dbang po'i chos mi gnyis par 'gro ba bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad lung ston te/
mi gnyis par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa sna tshogs/ med bcu rdul yab brjod du med par
gshegs pa mi gnyis pa dang / chos kyi don ma lus pa thams cad las rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sku mi gnyis pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang / 'byung ba'i skad cig ma'i mtha'i ye shes mi gnyis shing thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba gnyis su med pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi zhing gi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi gsung dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gnyis su
med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba dang / rab tu phigs pa dang / rnam par rig pa gnyis su med pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi chos nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gnyis
su med pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis su med de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang po'i chos kyis mi gnyis par gshegs pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

chos thams cad la nan tan gyis gnas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
thugs rje chen po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji ltar smon lam gyis 'byung ba la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can yongs su mi gtong zhing 'dul ba la gnas pa dang /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngo bo med pa la rab tu gnas pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don med pa ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skal ba mnyam pa ma yin par
gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu sems mnyam pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma nyams pa'i dbang po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
sems chags pa med par spyod pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing mi 'jigs pa yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos thams cad kyi nan tan la gnas pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon

par mkhyen pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa'i grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / ma 'ongs pa thams cad kyi grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa
dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / ngag thams cad kyi lam thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'jug pa thams cad mngon par

mkhyen pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo'i ye shes thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang / sna tshogs rnam par

gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / bsam pa tshad med pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i mtshams kyi skad cig ma'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos thams

cad rkyen dang 'dus pa tshogs par khong du chud pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mthong ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos

kyi dbyings dbye ba mig 'phrul mkhan gyis rnam par phye ba ltar thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen

pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po dang / stobs dang / stobs tshad med pa dang / stobs kyi bdag nyid che ba dang / bzod par dka' ba'i stobs dang / yongs su ma nyams pa'i

stobs dang / snying po'i stobs dang / mi phyed pa'i stobs dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsam kyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i

stobs kyi dpal gyi chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi sku pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dang / 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis mi chod cing dug gis mi 'jigs pa
dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'tshig pa'i me'i bskal pas mi tshig pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang 'dzin pa'i chu'i phung po'i chus mi 'chi ba dang / bdud thams cad dang /

bdud kyi sde thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyi stobs dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i

stobs dang / sha za dang / 'bar ba thams cad kyi stobs dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi mig gi stobs kyis mi tshugs pa dang / ri rab lhun po'i ri dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i char 'bebs pa dang / gzhan yang

'khor yug chen po'i ri dang mnyam pa dang / gzhan yang stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i char babs te/ des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

ba spu yang mi 'gul/ bag tsha bar yang mi 'gyur bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba'i spyod lam spang ba 'ang mi mnga' ste/ yul gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun du ji

tsam du bzhed pa kun du de tsam du ma bab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa la yang gtses par ma gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi sems can la yang gtses par ma gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi

'khrugs pa lta ci smos te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos dang po'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhed na chos thams cad kyi dbyings mchog

ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / ri rab lhun po'i ri dang bcas/ kho ra khor yug dang / khor yug chen po'i ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho'i ri dang nags stug por bcas pa dang / sems can

gnas pa'i gnas sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu bcug ste tha ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mtha' bzung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis

brlabs ma gtogs par sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so/ /'jig rten gyi khams du ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu gar bcug nas mtha' ma'i mtha'i bskal par bzung ste/

bzhengs pa dang / bzhud pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba dang / bskal par gshegs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la skad cig kyang sdug bsngal du mi 'gyur/ skyo ba mi mnga' ste/ stobs dang mthu yongs su nyams

par mi 'gyur/ spyod lam la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin te/ 'bying ba ma
yin/ zhum pa ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'byung ba ma yin/ skye ba ma yin/ rnam pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams

ma lus pa thams cad kun 'dzin kyang de'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor ba'i sems skye ba gcig kyang mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i

chos brnyes pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gom pa gcig gi spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra'o/ /sangs

rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gom pas spyod do/ /du ma'i sems skye zhing 'jug pa de ltar gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu phra ba'i rdul
dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gshegs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems bskyed pa bzhin du bskal par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i

rdul dang / mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gnas shing tshad med pa dang / khor yug chen po'i ri brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'gyur ba dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang

mnyam pa 'das shing ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'gag par 'gyur te/ ji ltar ba spu'i bu ga gcig pa de ltar sku'i spu'i bu ga thams cad de sems can thams cad ji snyed pa ba spu'i bu gar gyur la/ de ltar sems can
thams cad lci bar gyur la/ sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo gcig gi rtse mos tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'dzin te/ ji ltar sor mo gcig gis dang por 'dzin pa de ltar sor
mo thams cad kyi rtse mos 'dzin kyang de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsnyel ba yang mi mnga'/ thugs la skyo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi reg pa tshor ro snyam pa'i sems phra rab gcig tsam
yang mi skye'o/ /de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams re rer gshegs shing 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la gshegs shing 'jug pa dang / rgya mo'i phyogs thams cad du gshegs shing 'jug pa dang / de ltar nam

mkha'i khams kyi mtha' ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar 'jug pa dang / skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi khams thams cad du 'jug pa dang / skra rtse re re'i mtha' tshad kyi grangs kyi
nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gsol ba'i skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi nam mkha'i khams su 'jug pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam thog ma'i mtha' dang tha ma'i mtha'i
bskal par zad cing 'das kyi bar du phyogs dang phyogs na skyil mo krung gcig gis bzhugs shing yongs su longs spyod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i

stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sku dang dbu du mar gyur

la/ dbu gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i ljags su gyur pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i

rdul dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang / gsung 'jug ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can kyi khams la go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang / gsung re res

kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i mdo sde dam pa rab tu bshad la/ mdo sde re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu

phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos ston pa'i rjes su 'brang la chos bstan pa re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa rnams

kyi brjod pa 'gro ste/ ji ltar gang gi phyir chos ston pa de ltar chos thams cad ston te/ de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston cing

sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa rnams yongs su zad nas/ yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i
rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston te/ gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston la/ gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa zad cing 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de lta ma yin te/ chos

thams cad mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'jug cing chos thams cad shes rab gyi ston te/ brda sprod cing the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi

'khor lo skor ba dang / chags pa med pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa tshim par byed pa'i 'dul ba'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa

thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad la ye shes kyi sgron ma chen po'i rgyun gyi

'khor lo skor ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po'i rgyan gyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing ji ltar sangs rgyas gcig gi sku'i byin gyis brlabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i sprin

chen po yang dpe thams cad gyis dper bya ba ma yin te/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar skra'i rtse mo'i mtha' nas rnam par phye ba chags pa med pa ma lus pa

thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma dang / sems kyi skad cig ma re re de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sprul pa

dang / ji srid du mtha' ma'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re ba de snyed de snyed kyi dbur gyur pa'i bar du sngar kun du brjod pa bzhin du dbu re re la/ de snyed

de snyed kyi ljags su gyur pa'i ljags re re la de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung dang / sku dang / gsung 'jug ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams na go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi

yan lag dang / sgra dang / gsung re res de snyed de snyed kyi mdo sde rnams 'chad de/ mdo sde re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos ston pa rjes su 'brang la chos ston pa re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa'i brjod pa 'gro ste/

chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa re res chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sgra gsal bar byed cing sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la go bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'dzin pa 'ang med/ nyams pa 'ang

med/ zad pa 'ang med/ dmas pa 'ang med de/ de ltar tha ma'i mthar bskal pa'i bar du gnas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi

dpal la gnas pa'i chos lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u yi rgyun dang ldan zhing / rdo rje'i snying po chen pos bzung ba de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs pa rnams
la bzhag nas sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud sdig can gyi sde gzugs sna tshogs bskrad cing mi sdug pa/ mchog tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ mchog tu sems
bskyed pa'i gzugs su 'phrul par byed do/ /byang chub kyi shing mchog gi drung du song nas chos thams cad kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthar bdud kyi mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ skrag pa chen pos 'jigs pa
chen por byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'jom pas/ 'jig rten thams cad 'jig pa'o/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs nas thams cad la gzigs te/ gzigs nas mi
bsnyengs/ bag mi tsha/ spu 'ga' yang mi g.yo/ gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang mi mnga'/ sems phra mo yang mi mnga' bar gnas te mi g.yo/ mi skyod mi 'gyur rnam par mi rtog /

shin du rab tu zhi/ bsnyengs shing ba spu ldang ba shin du mi mnga'/ 'dod pa dang khong khro ba shin du mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byams pa chen po chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gtong ba/ dbang po sbed cing thugs

rje chen po la gnas pa/ bag mi tsha ba'i thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying po thugs mi dngangs shing zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs kyis bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde mang po sna tshogs
thams cad zil gyis gnon cing gzod nas zil gyis gnon/ bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul gsum dang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba

bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos
drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyis khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'jug cing de dang de dag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par rig cing sems
can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra de ri la thogs pa med de/ ri rab lhun po la mi thogs rin po che'i ri la ma yin/ khor yug dang khor yug chen po la ma yin/ lha'i gnas la ma
yin/ klu'i gnas la ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas la ma yin/ dri za'i gnas la ma yin/ lha ma yin gyi gnas la ma yin/ nam mkha' lding gi gnas la ma yin/ mi 'am ci'i gnas la ma yin/
mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas la lta zhing chags par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs na 'ang mi chags te/ 'jig rten srid pa'i khams thams cad kyi sgra chen po dang /
'jig rten thams cad kyi sgra sna tshogs rab tu rdzogs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pas brjod pa'i sgras sgrib par 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna bas rnam par rig ste/ gang 'di rna bas
rnam par rig cing rnam par rig pa'i tshig dang 'byed pa nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgra bdun pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa bye

ba khrag khrig brgya stong du shin du yongs su sbyangs pas chags pa med/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan dang zhing rnyog pa med pa/ bdag gi med pa'i chos
thams cad la gnas pa/ nang dang phyi dang ldan pa ma yin/ ma skyes pa la brtsam pa thams cad rnam par phye ba/ zhi ba/ gnas med pa/ rtsom pa sna tshogs thams cad med pa/ ngo bo thams cad rnam
par rtog pa'i 'du shes la gnas pa 'gag pa/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ shin du yongs su dag pa/ rtsom pa dang yid la byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos thams
cad kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral zhing dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings ston pa'i mthar song ba/ chos kyi dbyings kun du mi zad pa'i rjes su song ba/

'du shes su gyur pa thams cad dang / tshad dang tshad med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / mngon par smra ba thams cad 'gags pa dag gis lam brjod du med pa'i mtha'i yul mi zad cing chags pa med

pa'i dbyings kyi mtha'i sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu'i rgyan dang chos thams cad rnam par dag pa/ thabs mkhas pa la zhugs pas chos sna tshogs dang / chos du ma dang / chos thams cad dang / ston pa 'gal

ba med pa/ dus gsum du dbyer med pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i dbang gi pha rol du song ba/ chos thams cad kyi dbang gi 'byung gnas kyi mdzod kyi khyad

par chos thams cad kyi tshul dran zhing kun nas gti mug pa zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i dbang dang / rgya mo'i phyogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi mdo med bcu rdul yab la mi gnas pa/ brtan par gnas shing mi 'pho ba/

ye shes kyi lta ba chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa/ zag pa thams cad yongs su zad cing zag pa med pa/ sems rnam par grol ba/ shes rab rnam par grol ba/ shin du rnam par grol ba yang dag pa'i
mtha' mi zad pa'i mchog chags pa med par gnas pa/ rtag tu mnyam pa dang rab tu ldan pa/ dus gsum la chags pa med par gnas pa/ sems kyi skad cig ma la dus gsum gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad
ma lus par rab tu shes pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sgra
dang lus gcig tu 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang yul tshad med pa mtha' dang dbung med pa'i sku yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sku/ khams gsum gyis mi gos

pa'i sku/ rkyen gyi sku rnam par rig cing lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su dran pa la byin gyi brlabs kyi su'i tshogs ston pa/ mi bden mi brdzun zhing mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i sku/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa'i chos kyi

sku 'dus pa/ 'dus ma byas shing 'jig pa med pa'i sku/ mtshan nyid gcig dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku/ tshogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku/

sangs rgyas khyu mchog rnam par sprul pa'i sku/ kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sku/ sku thams cad rjes su 'brang ba/ sku sna tshogs su rnam par rig pa/ chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba/ mtha' yas par snang ba'i ye

shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod kyi sku/ bya ba sna tshogs med pa/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i sku/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la khyab par gsol ba'i sku 'dus pa/ mi g.yo mi sems

pa'i sku rnam par dag pa/ med pa dang med pa ma yin pa dang / tshul dang tshul ma yin pas phye ba'i sku/ sems can thams cad kyi dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su song zhing 'dul ba'i sku/ 'gags pa dang / 'gags pa ma yin

pa 'dul ba la gzigs pa'i yon tan dkon mchog thams cad byung ba bsgreng ba'i sku/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos dang de bzhin nyid bsdus pa'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis shin du zhi ba dang bsgribs pa med pa'i mtha'i sku

thogs pa med pa'i chos thams cad las skyes pa'i sku/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ chos kyi dbyings dag pa/ 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i sku/ brtsam pa las mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i ye

shes thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ kun 'brang ba'i rjes su song ba'i sku ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku 'dus pa dgu pa'o/ /

gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i ye shes rnam par chud pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba/ spyod pa las mngon par byung ba/

smon lam gyi khyad par dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes bya ba sna tshogs med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa thams cad las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa thams cad kyi cho ga shes pa/ smon lam chen po dang / spyod pa mi chung ba/ spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dga' ba ma yin pa/ spyod pa'i

stobs bzod par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad las byung zhing spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzang po spyad pa mi 'bri bar spyod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa thams
cad la gnas pa/ spyod yul mtha' yas pa lam thams cad ston pa/ lam ma yin pa'i yul dang lam thams cad la zhugs pa/ ye shes mchog gi stobs kyi cho ga shes pa/ 'dzem pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo

'bebs pa/ dge ba 'dri ba dang / mi 'dri ba dang / btsun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa'i ye shes mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes shin du yongs su dag pa lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa gsum yongs su dag pa/

sangs rgyas kyi sgo ma rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas song ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / mdzad pa thams cad la zhugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa/

tshad med par ston pa dag gnas pa/ rtsa ba med cing mtha' med pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ye shes 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ 'gro ba ma lus pa

thams cad kyi thams cad chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthong ba dang / phra ba ma lus pa mtha' dang dbung med pa'i ye shes/ dus gsum thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul dang phra ba'i ye shes rjes su rtogs pa/ 'jig rten

gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don dang / ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad par brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan zhing / phyir mi ldog pa'i

ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku/ grangs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi chos yi ge med par rab tu rtog pa/ brjod du med pa'i ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bye ba dang / yi ge thams cad brjod du med par shes par
byed/ ye shes kyi dge bar spyod pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa kun du bzang po'i ye shes kyi rim pa/ sems skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes

ji ltar 'os pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / ji ltar skye mched kyi chos gtong bar rab tu yid la byed pa'i ye shes chos thams cad kyi yul gyi mtshams ma yin pa/ 'jig rten gyi yul khams ma lus
pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems gyi skad cig ma gcig la chags pa med pa'i

ye shes kyi mthong ba'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yul la 'jug cing thams cad 'dul ba'i yul ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag par sangs rgyas kyi
yid kyi mtshams su thob pa mngon par mkhyen cing yul thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ sems can gyi sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lus pa thams cad rtogs pa/ dus gsum

gyis phye ba'i sems kyi skad cig ma la ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas shing mtshams ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba

mtha' med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / dus gsum thams cad du 'gro ba dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas khyu mchog thams cad du 'gro ba dang / khong du chud pa ma lus pa

thams cad du 'gro ba dang / de dag ma lus pa thams cad las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnam par chud pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi gtong ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu
'phrul rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs te/ de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' dang dbung med par gnas pa/ sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi sku mtha' dang dbung med par gnas pa/ sems chags pa med par

gnas pa/ mtha' dang dbung med pa'i snying rje chen po sbyor ba la gnas pa/ dus thams cad du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par gnas pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi

mthu chen po'i dpal dang / ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bcu ste

sems can thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad mi zin pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams bzhugs pa'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshe ji tsam par dga' ldan na bzhugs shing tshe zad nas 'pho bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zla ba bcur

bzhugs pa'i tshe ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'byung zhing 'byung bar bzhed pa'i thugs kyis bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na
bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig ma gcig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas bzhugs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sprul par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dul ba'i

dus ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du ston te brda sprod cing bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brda sprod cing bzhugs
pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skad cig la sems can thams cad kyis dri ba dris pa rnams skad cig la brda sprod cing bzhugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
pa'i chos bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can
ngan par 'gro ba'i sems can rnams gzigs ma thag tu de dag myur du zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du bsod nams yongs su
rdzogs par lhag par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can
gzigs ma thag tu myur du mtho ris su skye ba rnam par dag pa so sor thob par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du nem nur dang / yid gnyis
'joms par nye bar gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can gzigs ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa'i phyir myur du gshegs shing sems rgya

chen po la dad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i 'gro ba byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
gsha' mar zhugs pa gzigs ma thag tu dmigs par lta ba dang / gsha' mar 'jug pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams gzigs ma thag tu myur du
sems can rnams kyi dbang po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par dag par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du bsgribs pa thams cad zad par mdzad du
gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du snang ba so sor rnyed cing zhum pa med de/ mi 'jigs pa la spobs pa rtsom par mdzad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin du gzigs pa'i chos bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu ste/
bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol du
phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgrubs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams
yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs kyi lus tshad med mtha' yas pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul
dang / rnam par sprul pa tshad med mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi stobs bcu dang /
mi 'jigs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang /
sems gcig gi spyod pa dang / rnam par g.yo ba ldog pa sems kyi skad cig ma la mkhyen pa dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum kun gyi las rnams dang / las dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang /

rnam pa dang / rim pa dang / las rnams kyi 'phel zhing sog pa'ang phyi ma'i rnam par smin pa'i rim pa sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can
can gyi ris sna tshogs dang / sems can gyi ris gcig dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul zhing ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /

rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / rgya mo'i phyogs kyi ris thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ba dang /

sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis mtshan mar bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba lta ba rnam par phye ba mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta

ba dang / dad pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du skad cig la tshad med pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i byin gyis brlabs mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can pha

rol gyi bsam par sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad 'dzin pa med pas sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba bzhin du 'doms shing rjes su bstan pa dang /

de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ston par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro zhing sems kyi skad cig ma la de dang de dag tu 'gro ba'i nan tan mkhyen pa dang / sems

kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi phyogs thams cad la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gtong zhing sbyor ba mkhyen pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus

pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi dad pa tshad med pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku la lta ba dang / gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog gi gnas mtha' yas pa ston pa mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis

sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la chos
kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi
khams sna tshogs kyi rim pa bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa kun nas snang bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum la snyoms par 'jug

cing sems kyi skad cig ma'i mtha' la snyoms par 'jug cing gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad kyi rgya mo thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing

rigs dang zhing thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing zhing mi zad pa'i mthar gyur par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tha

yas pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par rig pa ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang lus dang /

ngag dang / sems yongs su gsal ba la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing / sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs kyi gnas mdzod du gnas shing skad cig la dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa dang sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma

lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rkyen la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig la smra ba'i rkyen ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi dang
'jig rten las 'das pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la mtha' yas pa'i rkyen gyi rjes su song ba ste sangs rgyas la lta ba mi gcod cing sems can sangs rgyas

mtha' yas pa la lta bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad bsgrub pa med pa la snyoms par zhugs shing / skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs shing

rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa brnyes pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul

gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba ston pa rnam par

thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang

brjod du med pa'i zhing ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa

dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung zhing rje ba rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul pa

ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ston pa rnam par thar pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu'o/ /snyan gyi gong rgyan
rgyas pa chen po'i mdo le'u 'bum pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so// //@#/ /rgya gar skad du/
Ar+ya dI pam ka ra bya ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na su trA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas
te chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la so sor brtag pa nyid kyis bsam pa shin du

yongs su dag par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ngas sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la zhe sa dang bcas pas bsnyen bkur byas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nga sngar bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan gyi/ gang gi tshe ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad mthong nas ud pa la lnga phul ba de'i 'og tu nga chos bdag med pa nyid la mos par

gyur cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo de bas na khyod dge ba'i rtsa bas chog shes par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa
grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po ma skyes dgra zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/

blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ kun dga' bo rgyal po ma skyes dgra de la grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ thams cad kyang bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ bskyed
mos tshal phun sum tshogs pa/ rdzing bu phun sum tshogs pa/ me tog phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/ 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ skye bo dang mi

mang pos gang ba sha stag go/ /kun dga' bo rgyal po ma skyes dgra de la rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rgyal po ma bskyes dgra de de na gnas so/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mdun na 'don

bram ze gling ldan zhes bya ba snying du sdug cing mthong na mi mthun pa med pa dang ldan pa zhig yod do/ /kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra rigs bzhi'i mi thams cad bsdus nas bram ze gling ldan bkug

ste/ cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid phyed byin te 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /bram ze khyod rang gi yul du song ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang byos la ming yang pad ma can du thogs shig /kun dga' bo de nas rgyal

po gling ldan gyi rang gi yul du rgyal po'i pho brang byas te/ ming yang pad ma can du btags so/ /kun dga' bo de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na rgyal po gnyis rgyal srid byed de/ gcig ni
ma skyes dgra'o/ /cig shos ni gling ldan no/ /kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi btsun mo dam pa khang bzangs kyi yang thog na bde bar nyal zhing 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me

mdzad dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas glang po che'i phru gu thal kar du bsgyur te/ 'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing ma'i glo g.yas par zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe btsun mo dam pa des rgyal po gling
ldan la skabs 'dir smras so/ /kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyis bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan dang / mchod sbyin mkhan rnams bsdus te rmi lam gyis skabs 'di bsnyad

pa dang / bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis brnyed pa legs par brnyed de/ khyod kyi sras sems can rin po che zhig bltam par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan

rmi lam bstan pa 'di thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rgyal po gling ldan de'i rgyal khams su gtogs pa thams cad la sbyin pa byin te/ 'di lta ste/

zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/ spos dang / phreng ba rgyu dang / byug pa dang / gnas mal rung ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gang ci dang ci 'dod pa

thams cad byin no/ /kun dga' bo de nas zla ba bcu 'das pa dang / rgyal po gling ldan gyi bu gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/ btsas

ma thag tu lus las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas

gzhon nu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas gzhon nu de la shis par brjod pa byas te/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /'di btsas ma thag tu lus las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des rgyal po gling ldan gyi
rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur pas gzhon nu'i ming mar me mdzad du btags so/ /de nas gzhon nu'i ming mar me mdzad mar me mdzad ces bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga'
bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ yang de'i rgyal khams su gtogs pa thams cad la sbyin pa byin te/ 'di lta ste/
zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/ spos dang / phreng ba rgyu dang / byug pa dang / gnas mal rung ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
gang ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad byin no/ /kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyis rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad bkug ste/ cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid phyed byin te 'di skad ces kyang smras
so/ /gzhon nu khyod song la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug cing rtses shig /dga' bar gyis shig /dga' dgur spyod cig /kun dga' bo de nas re shig na rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad
btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas bzhon pa chen po la zhon te/ bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag gcig

gis bdag cag nyid rgas shing 'khogs pa dang / nad kyis btab pa dang / shi ba yang bstan te dge sbyong zhig kyang der bzhag pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad kyis mthong nas kha lo sgyur ba la 'di

skad ces smras so/ /kye kha lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba 'di dag ci yin/ kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgas pa zhes bgyi ba dang / na ba zhes bgyi ba dang / shi ba zhes bgyi ba lags te
gzhon nu ji srid du chos nyid gdags pa mchis pa de srid du rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i chos rnams mchis te gzhon nu/ khyod dang 'o skol yang de lta bu lags te/ 'khor ba na gnas
pa kho na lags so/ /gzhon nus smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba mgo bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon la zhi zhing nye bar zhi ba gnya' shing gang tsam du blta ba 'di su zhig /kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ gzhon nu
'di ni dge slong ste/ sdig pa thams cad spangs pa thar pa la mngon par dga' ba'i 'du shes bskyed nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba lags so/ /gzhon nus smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba legs so/ /

legs so/ /dge slong 'di'i lam 'di ni 'dod pa yin no zhes nas phyir log te khyim du song ngo / /kun dga' bo de nas re shig na rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad yang bskyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ngo / /de bskyed

mos tshal gyi gnas su phyin pa dang / de na sangs rgyas brgya stong mang pos bsten pa'i byang chub kyi snying po mthong ngo / /kun dga' bo de nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad kyis byang chub kyi snying po de mthong nas skyes

pa dang bud med kyi tshogs thams cad ha cang thag mi ring bar bor nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ des byang chub kyi snying po mthong ba dang / lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub kyi snying po der dkyil

mo dkrung bcas te 'dug go/ /byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad 'dug ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe de nyid kyi mtshan mo'i skya reng dang po shar ba'i dus na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu de'i tshe sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum

gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas sgra 'di skad ces kyang bsgrags so/ /kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'di

'jig rten du byung ste/ 'di ltar de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad lo lnga bcu'i bar du byang chub kyi snying po de na bzhugs kyang tha na sems can

gcig tsam yang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor gyi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang /

bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams bde ba dang ldan pas ha cang bag med

par gyur gyi/ ngas de rnams cung zhig yid byung bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du

mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams kyi nang du bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po blta na sdug

pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang la/ mi de dag kyang lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par blta na bsdug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag cig mngon par sprul to/ /de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i

mi rnams bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis spa gong bar ni gyur na gang yang skyo bar ni ma gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams ha cang bag med pa dang ldan par gyur pas ngas yang cung zhig skyo ba bskyed par bya gor ma chag

snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis yang 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du

mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po de la me chen po 'bar bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu de la me 'bar bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe sems can de dag dang grong

khyer chen po de yang yongs su zad cing mthar thug pa dang zhig par gyur nas sems can de dag kyang tshul ma yin pa mthong bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi

rnams kyis bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po rgud par mthong nas dngangs skrag par gyur cing skyo bar gyur nas spu zing zhes byed de/ de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /gang gi phyir grong khyer de yongs su zad cing mthar

thug pa dang zhig par gyur pa las na ring po mi thogs par bdag cag kyang de lta bu'i mi rtag pa'i gnas skabs su gyur na su zhig bdag cag gi skyabs su 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi 'di rnams yongs su smin pas ngas chos bstan pa kun shes par nus shing skal ba dang ldan pa dang mthu yod

par gyur to/ /snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis mi de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis byang chub kyi snying po de las bzhengs te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong lha'i

dbang po brgya byin dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der gshegs so/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad byon ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis chos

bstan pa dang po'i tshe srog chags nyi khri rab tu phyung ste/ de dag thams cad len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /chos bstan pa gnyis pa'i tshe srog chags sum khri rab tu phyung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang

len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /chos bstan pa gsum pa'i tshe srog chags bzhi khri rab tu phyung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /

chos bstan pa bzhi pa'i tshe srog chags lnga khri bar tu phyung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po gling ldan gyi bu zhig skyes nas de bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes thos nas de la pho nya btang ste/ 'di ltar bdag kyang mchod par 'tshal na bdag gi thad du gshegs par gsol zhes spring ngo / /de nas pho nya des rgyal po ma

skyes dgra las mnyan nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba dang / rgyal po gling ldan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas phrin de skad smras so/ /de nas rgyal po gling ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas skabs de gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod snying las chung ngur gyis la slar song shig /nga ni rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can du gshegs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad

dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs

su bskor cing / rgyal po gling ldan yang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i tshogs mang po dang / rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i bdog pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i rnam par

rtse ba chen po dang chas te yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te thabs gcig tu gshegs so/ kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de rim gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can ga la ba der gshegs so/ /

de'i tshe na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la bram ze rin po che zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bstan bcos dang / rig byed dang / gsang sngags thams cad slob tu 'jug go/ /de na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam

po de dag gi nang na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya ba gzhon nu dar la bab pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags dang bstan bcos dang / cho ga shes

pa ji snyed pa thams cad la mkhas pa zhig yod do/ /kun dga' bo de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya bas mkhan po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye mkhan po bdag grong dang / grong khyer

dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su mchi'o/ /mkhan pos smras pa/ kye bram ze'i khye'u bdag cag bram ze rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ gang gis bstan bcos dang / rig byed dang /
